testcase.classname: Add product to cart on SauceDemo
testcase.name: Attempt to checkout with empty cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in to SauceDemo........................................passed When User clicks the cart icon with empty cart..............................passed And User proceeds to checkout...............................................passed Then User sees error message for empty cart.................................passed

testcase.name: Full checkout process and logout
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed And I have valid username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".......passed When I login with valid credentials.........................................passed And I open the menu.........................................................passed Then the Logout link should be visible......................................passed And I should see the page title "Products"..................................passed When I navigate to the first product detail page............................passed Then I should see the product name on detail page...........................passed When I add the product to the cart..........................................passed Then I should see a "Remove" button for that product........................passed When I go to the cart page..................................................passed Then I should see the product "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart.............passed When I click the checkout button............................................passed Then I should be on the checkout information page...........................passed When I enter first name "Jan" and last name "Novak" and postal code "10400".passed And I continue to the overview page.........................................passed Then I should be on the checkout overview page..............................passed And I should see the product "Sauce Labs Backpack" in overview..............passed When I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I should be on the login page..........................................passed
